input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
it took me forever to find a place to park .
afterward i spent some time browsing the local shops .
there were many classic cars on the road there .
output.sentences: This weekend seemed like the perfect time for Marty to go on his vacation.
He knew as soon as he put the car in park that he could stay in this place forever.
The time he spent in the shops was nice, but he wanted something different.
Then on the next road he found what excited him which was classic cars!
He decided he would come back here again the next time he was able to take a trip.
